MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY7 postcode areas of Glenrothes. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.30pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and repairs are taking longer than expected due to a fault on our overhead line network, our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.45pm on 12th November 2020
